example.text: Click here to watch my question series. One thing is clear after the hearing: this administration's policies are the cause of the current border crisis.

Prioritizing Florida's Farmers and Producers I am proud to have joined my colleagues on the Land Grant Research Prioritization Act -a bipartisan bill that provides funding for research to develop solutions for American farmers and producers. Agricultural producers here in Florida and across the country are facing increased demand and unprecedented challenges.

Click Here for More Info Reining in Washington's Reckless Spending This week, the House passed the Fiscal Responsibility Act , the largest deficit reduction bill in history. This is a huge win for ALL Americans and for generations to come.

Do you think we should finish the border wall to keep our friends and families safe? Yes No Submit Click here to take Survey *Click here to watch my question series with the Chief of US Border Patrol.

We must prevent Chinese coercion, reduce our reliance on products sourced in China, and maintain strong relationships with our international allies in the process. Watch my complete question series here .
We are currently working on a bill that will secure our border to ensure the safety of all Americans . To learn more about my work, check out my website and subscribe to my newsletter !
